file_insights.description: Manages template marketplace state with async API interactions
key_features: State management for templates, offers, and deployments

patterns_discovered: Redux Toolkit with createSlice and createAsyncThunk
Comprehensive error handling in async thunks
Derived selectors for complex state filtering
gotchas_discovered: Uses localStorage directly for token retrieval
Relies on environment variable for API base URL
Potential performance impact with multiple selectors

key_achievements: Added flexible filtering and selection mechanisms

recommendations: Consider using a more secure token management method
Add TypeScript for better type safety
Create unit tests for async thunks and reducers
